```

```{r relation}
plot(data$cd34 ~ data$trans, pch=16, xlab="Transfusions - yes or no", ylab="CD34+ cell dose", col="blue")
abline(lm(data$cd34 ~ data$time), col = "blue")
anova(lm(data$cd34 ~ data$time))
anova(lm(data$trans ~ data$hgb + data$time + data$cd34 + data$sex + data$mc  + data$rec + data$banacha.co + data$age + data$ntrans     ))

```{r plot}
x=table(data$diag)>1
x=x[x==TRUE]
data[data[ , "diag"] == 1]
plot(data)
```
